description:
It was discovered that libmaxminddb incorrectly handled certain memory
operations. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause
applications using libmaxminddb to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

libmaxminddb.description: C library for the MaxMind DB file format

title: libmaxminddb vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: libmaxminddb could be made to crash if it received specially crafted data.
